mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZO_SAMPLE_002 ( TEST_COL_F02, TEST_COL_F03, TEST_COL_F04, TEST_COL_F05, TEST_COL_F06, TEST_COL_F07, TEST_COL_F08, TEST_COL_F09, TEST_COL_F10, TEST_COL_F11, TEST_COL_F12, TEST_COL_F13, TEST_COL_F14, TEST_COL_F15, TEST_COL_F16, TEST_COL_F17, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{testColF02}, #{testColF03}, #{testColF04}, #{testColF05}, #{testColF06}, #{testColF07}, #{testColF08}, #{testColF09}, #{testColF10}, #{testColF11}, #{testColF12}, #{testColF13}, #{testColF14}, #{testColF15}, #{testColF16}, #{testColF17}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.select: SELECT TEST_COL_F01 AS "testColF01", TEST_COL_F02 AS "testColF02", TEST_COL_F03 AS "testColF03", TEST_COL_F04 AS "testColF04", TEST_COL_F05 AS "testColF05", TEST_COL_F06 AS "testColF06", TEST_COL_F07 AS "testColF07", TEST_COL_F08 AS "testColF08", TEST_COL_F09 AS "testColF09", TEST_COL_F10 AS "testColF10", TEST_COL_F11 AS "testColF11", TEST_COL_F12 AS "testColF12", TEST_COL_F13 AS "testColF13", TEST_COL_F14 AS "testColF14", TEST_COL_F15 AS "testColF15", TEST_COL_F16 AS "testColF16", TEST_COL_F17 AS "testColF17", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ZO_SAMPLE_002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND TEST_COL_F01 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF01}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F02 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF02}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F03 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF03}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F04 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF04}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F05 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF05}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F06 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF06}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F07 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF07}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F08 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF08}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F09 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF09}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F10 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF10}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F11 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF11}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F12 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF12}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F13 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF13}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F14 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF14}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F15 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF15}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F16 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF16}, '%') AND TEST_COL_F17 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{testColF17}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT TEST_COL_F01 AS "testColF01", TEST_COL_F02 AS "testColF02", TEST_COL_F03 AS "testColF03", TEST_COL_F04 AS "testColF04", TEST_COL_F05 AS "testColF05", TEST_COL_F06 AS "testColF06", TEST_COL_F07 AS "testColF07", TEST_COL_F08 AS "testColF08", TEST_COL_F09 AS "testColF09", TEST_COL_F10 AS "testColF10", TEST_COL_F11 AS "testColF11", TEST_COL_F12 AS "testColF12", TEST_COL_F13 AS "testColF13", TEST_COL_F14 AS "testColF14", TEST_COL_F15 AS "testColF15", TEST_COL_F16 AS "testColF16", TEST_COL_F17 AS "testColF17", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ZO_SAMPLE_002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${testColF01} ) AND ( ${testColF02} ) AND ( ${testColF03} ) AND ( ${testColF04} ) AND ( ${testColF05} ) AND ( ${testColF06} ) AND ( ${testColF07} ) AND ( ${testColF08} ) AND ( ${testColF09} ) AND ( ${testColF10} ) AND ( ${testColF11} ) AND ( ${testColF12} ) AND ( ${testColF13} ) AND ( ${testColF14} ) AND ( ${testColF15} ) AND ( ${testColF16} ) AND ( ${testColF17} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
